column4: hmmm hello. sorry, may be a stupid question but ... isnt there a server edition for intel at 64bits?
server 64 bits is for amd and intel chips
the download page is saying "platform amd64"
it is the same intel and amd are compatible
allright thanks i'll proceed to the format. :P
intell implemented amd x86_64 as EMT
Extended Memory Technology they different names for the same extensions to original x86
allright ... was asking because when i tried to install the desktop version on my pc it would just not boot up.
you sure? when i tried the 32bit version it worked.
when i tried the 32bit version it worked flawlessly.
